name: 357 Magnum Revolver Blank Book by STRIKEBOOKS, Montreal
description:
Blank Leather Revolver Gun, Blank Book/Journal! 
.357 Magnum Revolver Book -Book is made to scale!
-84 pages of blank white handmade paper from St-Armands Papermakers in Montreal.
-Cover-Black Leather
-Endpapers-Black suede
-Measurements: 12 '' Full Width of Gun 8 6/8 '' length
-Textblock (pages inside book)- 3 '' X 2 '' 

Please allow 2 weeks for production. Thanks!

Make Books NOT WAR 
Artist Book from Strikebooks!

name: EMBROIDERED Hand Bound Red Leather Journal by Strikebooks, Montreal
description:
Strikebooks Bindery Upcycled Recycled BookBinding
*******Bookbinding Original Handmade Book Arts*****************
********************Hand stitched! One of a kind!******

Hand bound- no machines!!!!!
Red leather blank hardcover Sketchbook/Journal, one-of-a-kind, unique blank book!
104 pages of white watercolor acid free paper; the paper is folded, hand torn. Book covers in Red leather with hand embroidered drawing on front cover, in yellow and blue hemp twine! Endpaper's consist of green/yellow handmade paper from St-Armand papermakers in Montreal, with red acrylic drawings! The book is hand sewn with blue and yellow hemp twine! Book measurements: 7 1/8 " width x 5 1/2" length

The leather covers protect the book from heavy knapsack pounding and overall urban wear and tear! Recycled materials!If you have any questions about this book contact Tammy Forsythe at tusketdance [at] cooptel.qc.ca, or go to www.tusketdance.com. 
The cost of shipping includes cost of padded envelope.
Custom tailored requests welcome!

name: HAMMER Book Blank JOURNAL by Strikebooks Montreal Handmade Paper
description:
Strikebooks Bindery Upcycled Recycled BookBinding
*******Bookbinding Original Handmade Book Arts*****************
Hand stitched! One of a kind!

Hammer Book number 3- February 1st, 2010. 

Small hammer book, blank journal/sketchbook.
62 Pages of blank white handmade cotton paper from St.Armand Papermakers in Montreal. The Paper is folded, hand torn. Covers in recycled red and black leather.
Inside endpapers in black leather. Book sewn with green colored hemp twine.

Book Board Dimensions: 6 1/2'' X 5 '' Book's full extension: 10 3/4'' Textblock: 2 1/4 '' X 2 1/2 '' 

'Paper, made by the wizards, those anarchists, around and around, with hands and elbows up to it full of water damp cold one by one ancient craftspeople each sheet comes off the screen, no one speaks in there, they JUST make PAper!''

For more images of the book go to www.strikebooks.etsy.com

If you are interested in your own hammer, more personalized let me know- Commissions are welcome! Thanks.

STRIKE!!!!
